# Drow Spells
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Drow|drow]] spells introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Dancing Shade]]
- [[Form of Shadow]]
- [[Loom Large]]
- [[Naraneus's Fangs]]
- [[Shadow Cast]]
- [[Shadow Mote]]
- [[Shadow Raising]]
- [[Shadow Shackles]]
- [[Umbral Step]]
